mapper.select: SELECT solt.Sales_Order_lNo, solt.Sales_Order_lCus_No, pit.PRODUCT_ITEM_NAME Sales_Order_lName, solt.Sales_Order_lCode, pit.PRODUCT_INFO_STND_1 Sales_Order_STND_1, solt.Sales_Order_lQty, solt.Sales_Order_lSum, solt.Sales_Order_lUnit_Price, solt.Sales_Order_lPrice, solt.Sales_Order_lNot_Stocked, solt.Sales_Order_Send_Clsfc, solt.Sales_Order_lInfo_Remark FROM Sales_OrderList_tbl solt INNER JOIN PRODUCT_INFO_TBL pit ON solt.Sales_Order_lCode = pit.PRODUCT_ITEM_CODE WHERE Sales_Order_lCus_No = #{SalesOrderNo} ORDER BY Sales_Order_lNo
